# bigcommerce Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "bigcommerce" {
  store_hash   = "your-hash"
  client_id    = "your-client-id"
  access_token = "your-access-token"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- **access_token** (String, Sensitive)
- **client_id** (String, Sensitive)
- **store_hash** (String)
